### Version 1.3
#### 08-11-2019


_Functionality_

- Statistics tab now shows info about Gene Ontology processes found in the current graph.
- Added a link to open the 'Getting started' page for first-time users.

_Fixes_
        
- Fixed a bug where not all protein names could be shown in short form.
- Mouse cursor now changes to 'clickable' when hovering above a node in the network.

_Other_

- New layout which is more logical and ordered.
- Changed About page to show more info about data used in this app.
- Changed Changelog pages to RMarkdown pages for easy updates.
